greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generalized Catalan numbers C(-1; n).
comment: See triangle A064334 with columns m built from C(-m; n), m >= 0, also for Derrida et al. references.
Unsigned sequence with a(0) := 0 is A000957 (Fine).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Paul Barry and Aoife Hennessy, Generalized Narayana Polynomials, Riordan Arrays, and Lattice Paths, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 15, 2012, #12.4.8. [_N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 08 2012]
S. B. Ekhad, M. Yang, Proofs of Linear Recurrences of Coefficients of Certain Algebraic Formal Power Series Conjectured in the On-Line Encyclopedia Of Integer Sequences, (2017).
P. Pagacz, M. Wojtylak, On the spectral properties of a class of H-selfadjoint random matrices and the underlying combinatorics, arXiv:1310.2122 [math.PR], 2013.
formula: G.f.: (1+x*c(-x)/2)/(1-x/2) = 1/(1-x*c(-x)) with c(x) g.f. of Catalan numbers A000108.
mathematica: a[n_]:= (1/2)^n*(1 + Sum[ CatalanNumber[k]*(-2)^k, {k, 0, n-1}]); Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 17 2013 *)
program: vector(30, n, n--; a(n)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 27 2019
(Sage) [1] + [(1 +sum((-2)^k*catalan_number(k) for k in (0..n-1)))/2^n for n in (1..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 27 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 21 2001
